hero.title: Es Currals Alpacas Ibiza
hero.subtitle: The very first alpaca farm in Ibiza, located in the rural north on an authentic finca. Home to Wishfulfilling Weaving, where exclusive scarves are hand-woven on a traditional wooden loom using alpaca wool.

tour.title: Book a Tour
tour.description: Experience our farm, meet the alpacas, learn the weaving craft, and enjoy the Ibiza landscape.

shop.title: Shop Woven
shop.description: Handcrafted scarves, blankets, and artisanal pieces made from natural alpaca wool using traditional techniques.

commission.title: Commission
commission.description: Create something unique. Commission a custom piece with your own colors, patterns, and dimensions.

alcaca.title: Buy Alcaca
alcaca.description: Premium alpaca manure for organic gardening and sustainable farming. Order in bulk or sample packs.

features.sectionSubtitle: We blend hospitality, craftsmanship, and animal welfare into every experience

farm.title: Working Farm
farm.description: A genuine, active alpaca farm and weaving studio in the heart of Ibiza. Every piece tells a story of our animals and land.

artisan.title: Artisanal Process
artisan.description: Hand-processed fibers, natural dyes, traditional patterns. Every step honors the craft and the alpacas.

sustainable.title: Sustainable & Natural
sustainable.description: Organic practices, eco-friendly products, biodegradable packaging. Care for animals and planet.

appointment.title: By Appointment
appointment.description: Intimate visits only. We keep our farm calm and peaceful for the alpacas — and for you.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Every product is hand-checked. We stand behind the quality and longevity of our work.

welfare.title: Animal Welfare First
welfare.description: Our alpacas are cherished members of our family. Their comfort and happiness drive everything we do.

experiences.sectionSubtitle: Beyond tours — create custom memories at our farm

privateFarm.title: Private Farm
privateFarm.description: Visits by appointment only. Intimate, peaceful experiences in a real working farm.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Learn weaving, natural dyeing, and fiber arts directly from our artisan team.

events.title: Events
events.description: Weddings, photoshoots, corporate retreats, alpaca yoga — customized experiences.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Alpacas Ibiza?
cta.subtitle: Whether you want to meet the herd, shop our collection, or commission something special — we're here to create an unforgettable experience.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected
newsletter.subtitle: Get updates on new products, workshops, and farm stories

tours.title: Book Your Alpaca Experience
tours.subtitle: Limited spots available by appointment. Each visit is intimate and personalized.
tours.reserveText: Select your preferred date and time to book your visit with our alpacas.
tours.integrationText: To activate the FareHarbor booking widget, add your company ID in the environment variables. The booking form will appear here.
tours.heroSubtitle: Join us for an unforgettable farm experience. Meet our alpacas, learn artisanal weaving, and immerse yourself in Ibiza's peaceful countryside.
tours.tourOptionsSubtitle: Choose the experience that speaks to you

meetHerd.title: Meet the Herd
meetHerd.description: Connect with our alpacas, learn their personalities, and understand their care and welfare.

weaving.title: Weaving Workshop
weaving.description: Hands-on introduction to fiber arts. Try hand-processing, natural dyeing, or basic weaving.

farm.title: Farm Experience
farm.description: Explore the land, see our sustainable practices, and enjoy the Mediterranean landscape.

photo.title: Photo Session
photo.description: Professional or personal photography with alpacas and scenic backdrops. Perfect for memories.

tours.timelineTitle: What to Expect on a Tour

arrival.title: Welcome & Orientation
arrival.description: Meet your guide, receive an overview of the day, and learn farm guidelines. Settle in and let the calm take over.

morning.title: Meet the Alpacas
morning.description: Spend time with our herd. Feed, pet, and learn the stories of our animals. Guides share insights on alpaca behavior and care.

midday.title: Weaving Studio Tour
midday.description: Explore our studio. See the full process: fiber preparation, natural dyeing, traditional patterns, and final finishing.

afternoon.title: Hands-On Activity
afternoon.description: Participate in a workshop or activity based on your interests: try hand-carding, dyeing, or simple weaving techniques.

closing.title: Relax & Reflect
closing.description: Wind down with refreshments. Browse our shop. Ask final questions. Leave with a heart full of memories.

hours.title: Operating Hours
hours.description: Tours by appointment only. Availability varies by season.

location.title: Location
location.details: Private farm. Directions and parking info provided upon booking.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.custom: Custom experiences and group rates available

specialEvents.title: Special Events & Private Bookings
specialEvents.description: Weddings, photoshoots, alpaca yoga, workshops, corporate retreats—we create custom experiences tailored to your vision.

bookingSection.title: Ready to Book?
bookingSection.subtitle: Check availability and secure your spot. Tours are limited to preserve the peaceful farm environment.
bookingSection.cardSubtitle: Secure your spot instantly. No payment required until confirmation.
bookingSection.questionsText: Contact us at hello@alpacasibiza.com or message via WhatsApp for personalized assistance.

guestStories.title: Guest Stories
guestStories.subtitle: See what visitors say about their experience
guestStories.testimonial: An unforgettable experience. The alpacas were wonderful, the guides were knowledgeable and warm, and the whole farm exuded peace and authenticity.

duration.q: How long is a typical tour?
duration.a: Standard tours are 2–3 hours. Workshops and extended experiences can be customized. We recommend checking available time slots when booking.

languages.a: We offer tours in English, Spanish, and Dutch. If you need another language, please contact us.

children.a: Yes! Tours are family-friendly. Children should be supervised, especially around the animals. We recommend ages 4+, but younger children can come with parental guidance.

wear.a: Wear comfortable, closed-toe shoes suitable for farm terrain. Bring sun protection in summer. Light layers are ideal, as the farm is outside. Avoid loud colors or strong perfumes to keep alpacas calm.

accessibility.q: Is the farm accessible for people with disabilities?
accessibility.a: Our farm is on natural terrain. Please contact us ahead to discuss accessibility and how we can accommodate your needs.

food.q: Can we bring food or drinks?
food.a: Outside food is not permitted, but we offer organic refreshments. We accommodate dietary restrictions—mention this when booking.

booking.q: How do I book a tour?
booking.a: Use our online booking system below to check availability and reserve your spot. Group bookings and custom experiences: contact us for options.

cancellation.q: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
cancellation.a: Cancellations up to 48 hours before your tour receive a full refund or rebooking. Less notice incurs a 50% fee.

private.q: Do you offer private tours or group events?
private.a: Yes! We offer private farm experiences, weddings, corporate retreats, and alpaca yoga sessions. Contact us for custom packages.

parking.a: Yes, free parking is available on-site. Spots are limited—arrive 15 minutes early to allow parking time.

alcacaPage.title: Premium Alpaca Manure
alcacaPage.subtitle: Rich in nutrients. Certified organic. Sustainably sourced from our farm.
alcacaPage.benefit1: Nutrient-rich organic fertilizer perfect for vegetables, flowers, and herbs
alcacaPage.benefit2: No harsh chemicals or artificial additives
alcacaPage.benefit3: Sustainable farming practices support our animal welfare mission

about.title: About Alpacas Ibiza
about.storyText: Alpacas Ibiza was founded on the belief that tourism can be meaningful, artisanal, and deeply connected to animal welfare. We created the first alpaca farm on the island to share our passion for these gentle creatures and their incredible fiber.

welfare.title: Animal Welfare
welfare.description: Our alpacas come first in every decision

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

footer.tagline: Ibiza's first alpaca farm and artisanal weaving studio

corporate.title: Corporate & Team Building
corporate.description: Disconnect to reconnect. Leadership retreats and team bonding with our gentle herd.

romantic.title: Romantic Sunset Walks
romantic.description: Golden hour magic. Private, intimate walks for couples (and proposal planning!).

family.title: Family Farm Days
family.description: Safe, educational fun for all ages. Introduce your little ones to nature.

corporate.title: Corporate Retreats & Team Building
corporate.subtitle: Disconnect to reconnect. Bring your team to the peaceful Ibiza countryside for a unique bonding experience with our alpaca herd.
corporate.whyText: Alpacas are sensitive, calming animals that mirror human energy. interacting with them requires patience, observation, and non-verbal communication—perfect skills for effective teamwork.

stress.title: Stress Reduction
stress.description: The calming presence of alpacas lowers cortisol and encourages mindfulness.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Learn to lead without force. Alpacas respond to calm assertiveness.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: Weaving workshops stimulate creative problem-solving and focus.

nature.title: Nature Connection
nature.description: Get your team out of the office and into the fresh Mediterranean air.

item1.title: Welcome & Refreshments
item1.desc: Coffee, tea, and local pastries on the terrace.

item2.title: Meet the Herd
item2.desc: Guided introduction to the alpacas. Learn their names and personalities.

item3.title: Team Challenge
item3.desc: Interactive activity: Leading an alpaca through a simple agility course requiring teamwork.

item4.title: Farm Lunch
item4.desc: Organic, locally sourced picnic lunch under the carob trees.

corporate.planText: We customize every corporate package to your team's size and goals. Contact us for a quote.

romantic.title: Sunset Romantic Walks
romantic.subtitle: Golden hour with the alpacas. A private, intimate experience for couples in the heart of Ibiza.
romantic.quote: "The most magical date we've ever had."
romantic.description: Escape the crowds. Just you, your partner, and our gentle alpacas wandering through the orange groves as the sun dips below the hills.

champagne.title: Champagne
champagne.desc: Optional Cava add-on to toast the sunset.

photos.title: Photos
photos.desc: Your guide captures candid moments so you can stay present.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.desc: Strictly private tours available upon request.

romantic.proposalText: Thinking of popping the question? We can help orchestrate the perfect moment with the alpacas as your witnesses.

family.title: Family Farm Days
family.subtitle: Introduce your children to the joy of animals. Safe, educational, and fun for all ages.
family.educationText: Our farm isn't just a petting zoo—it's an educational experience. Kids learn:

points.respect: Respect: How to approach animals gently.
points.biology: Biology: Why alpacas have soft fleece and pads instead of hooves.
points.sustainability: Sustainability: How we use alpaca manure ("Oro Negro") for farming.

gentle.title: Gentle Animals
gentle.desc: Our herd is socialized and used to children.

stroller.title: Stroller Friendly
stroller.desc: Paths are accessible for sturdy strollers.

age.a: We welcome all ages! Children under 3 are free. We recommend ages 4+ for the full walking experience.

safe.a: Yes, alpacas do not bite (they only have bottom teeth!) and are generally very calm. We teach your children exactly how to interact safely.

duration.a: Family visits are typically 1.5 to 2 hours, which is perfect for shorter attention spans.
